title: Drink Champs: THE HANGOVER (Recap of Ep. 194 w/ Cipha Sounds & Kardinal Offishall)
itunes:title: Drink Champs: THE HANGOVER (Recap of Ep. 194 w/ Cipha Sounds & Kardinal Offishall)
description:
Drink Champs: THE HANGOVER - In this edition of The Hangover the guys have fully recovered from their previous hangover- just to experience it all over again!

This week we recap our conversation with Cipha Sounds and Kardinal Offishall! Check out as Hazardis Soundz, Mr. Lee, Boris aka BeatsNdaHood, and Sunny D share some of their favorite moments from this weeks episode!

Follow:

Drink Champs

http://www.drinkchamps.com

http://www.instagram.com/drinkchamps

http://www.twitter.com/drinkchamps

http://www.facebook.com/drinkchamps

DJ EFN

http://www.crazyhood.com

http://www.twitter.com/djefn

http://www.facebook.com/crazyhoodproductions

N.O.R.E.

http://www.instagram.com/therealnoreaga

http://www.twitter.com/noreaga

Mr. Lee

http://www.instagram.com/starrockent

Boris (BeatsNdaHood)

http://www.instagram.com/borischp

Sunny D

http://www.instagram.com/sunnydbet

Hazardis Soundz

http://www.instagram.com/hazardissoundz

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
